abstract: Data presented by a Stanford University doctor showed that spinal fusion patients treated with high doses of the bone growth drug Amplify were at greater risk for cancer.
snippet: Data presented by a Stanford University doctor showed that spinal fusion patients treated with high doses of the bone growth drug Amplify were at greater risk for cancer.
lead_paragraph: A Medtronic product, when used in high doses during spinal fusion procedures, might increase patient cancer risks, according to data released Thursday at a national conference of spine surgeons.

headline.main: Data Links High Doses of Bone Drug to Cancer
headline.print_headline: Data Links High Doses Of Bone Drug To Cancer
